item.title: SonarCloud analysis in GitHub Actions
item.description: Running Sonar Cloud analysis on your open source project is usually a good thing, it is free, it gives you tons of useful information and you can automate everything for free with GitHub Actions. I’ve dealt with this ckind of functinoality before in my blog, today I want just to show how to create a GH action that works in linux, because usually if you take the original action from SonarCloud site it will use a windows machine for building.
